name: @sveltinio/seo
description: Add SEO metadata to Svelte and SvelteKit applications.
readme:
@sveltinio/seo

 
## Description A collection of types SEO related Svelte components to easily add structured SEO data to pages in Svelte & SvelteKit. ## Demos You can see live demos [here](https://www.sveltelab.dev/1omlyex216bwf75) or if you clone the repos by running `pnpm dev` ## Components List ### Metadata - [PageMetaTags] ### SchemaOrg - [JsonLdWebSite] - [JsonLdWebPage] - [JsonLdBreadcrumbs] - [JsonLdSiteNavigationElement] ## Install ```bash # pnpm pnpm install @sveltinio/seo # npm npm install @sveltinio/seo # yarn yarn add @sveltinio/seo ``` ## License Free and open-source software under the [MIT License](LICENSE) [PageMetaTags]: https://github.com/sveltinio/components-library/tree/main/packages/seo/src/lib/components/metadata/ [JsonLdWebSite]: https://github.com/sveltinio/components-library/tree/main/packages/seo/src/lib/components/schemaorg/website [JsonLdWebPage]: https://github.com/sveltinio/components-library/tree/main/packages/seo/src/lib/components/schemaorg/webpage [JsonLdBreadcrumbs]: https://github.com/sveltinio/components-library/tree/main/packages/seo/src/lib/components/schemaorg/breadcrumbs [JsonLdSiteNavigationElement]: https://github.com/sveltinio/components-library/tree/main/packages/seo/src/lib/components/schemaorg/sitenavigationelements
